name: Free Cites
startIntroPart1: After the bombs fell to the ground, many died, leaving behind the dust of the past. We know what it was like, but we need to move forward together. Alone, we are weak in front of our enemies, but together we are strong. As long as we are united, we will move forward, our common happiness.
startIntroPart2: Use your diplomatic capabilities to win over your neighbors and lead humanity on your behalf.
declaringWar: It's time to free your Cities from corporate shackles!
attacked: You have committed a terrible crime against our Cities and this stigma will remain on you until the end of time.
defeated: Take everything, just please... Don't touch our people...
introduction: Take everything, just please... Don't touch our people...
hateHello: Be careful... We've had enough of your crimes for a long time...
afterPeace: Let's end this bloodshed for the sake of our people.
tradeRequest: What do you think about it?
uniques: City-State territory always counts as friendly territory
Can spend Gold to annex or puppet a City-State that has been your ally for [5] turns
